item.title: Software, Estimation and the Planning Fallacy
item.description: My flight is delayed for 3 hours so I’m taking the rare opportunity to put together some thoughts on how software project estimation can trip companies, teams and individuals up. Waterfall Remember way back when everyone thought the Waterfall model was great? Well actually no, for the most part they didnt. The Waterfall model was put forward by Winston Royce back in the early 70’s as an example of a broken SDLC model.
